name: StarCollector VR
description:
StarCollector VR is a short physics-based puzzle game for HTC Vive. Manipulate objects to get a ball to it's goal. Make sure to collect all stars on the way. No big thing for the ultimate Starcollector, right?

Features:

  • Challenging physics-based puzzles.
  • 4 audio reactive surroundings handcrafted in Tilt Brush.
  • Intuitive interaction in Virtual Reality.
  • A powerful soundtrack by Six Umbrellas (CC).

The game features 4 levels. It was one of the submission projects for the Udacity VR-Development Course in 2017.

Credits:

A game by Daniel Bahr

Music by Six Umbrellas

Thanks to Udacity and all playtesters

Made with Unity and Tilt Brush
